# cicalc [![](reference/figures/cicalc.PNG)](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/)

{cicalc} contains a number of confidence intervals commonly used in the
pharma industry. For a full list of available methods see the [package
index](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/index.html)

## Installation

You can install the development version of cicalc from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("GSK-Biostatistics/cicalc")
```

## Example

A subsection of common CI’s available in this package are below:

``` r
library(cicalc)
# Example of CI for proportions
x <- c(
  TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE,
  FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE
)
ci_prop_wald(x, conf.level = 0.9)
#> 
#> ── Wald Confidence Interval without Continuity Correction ──────────────────────
#> • 5 responses out of 10
#> • Estimate: 0.5
#> • 90% Confidence Interval:
#>   (0.2399, 0.7601)
ci_prop_wilson(x, correct = TRUE)
#> 
#> ── Wilson Confidence Interval with continuity correction ───────────────────────
#> • 5 responses out of 10
#> • Estimate: 0.5
#> • 95% Confidence Interval:
#>   (0.2366, 0.7634)
ci_prop_clopper_pearson(x)
#> 
#> ── Clopper-Pearson Confidence Interval ─────────────────────────────────────────
#> • 5 responses out of 10
#> • Estimate: 0.5
#> • 95% Confidence Interval:
#>   (0.1871, 0.8129)
ci_prop_agresti_coull(x)
#> 
#> ── Agresti-Coull Confidence Interval ───────────────────────────────────────────
#> • 5 responses out of 10
#> • Estimate: 0.5
#> • 95% Confidence Interval:
#>   (0.2366, 0.7634)
ci_prop_jeffreys(x)
#> 
#> ── Jeffreys Interval ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> • 5 responses out of 10
#> • Estimate: 0.5
#> • 95% Confidence Interval:
#>   (0.2235, 0.7765)
# Example of CI for difference of proportions 
# Generate binary samples
responses <- expand(c(9, 3), c(10, 10))
arm <- rep(c("treat", "control"), times = c(10, 10))

# Calculate 95% confidence interval for difference in proportions
ci_prop_diff_mn(x = responses, by = arm)
#> 
#> ── Miettinen-Nurminen Confidence Interval ──────────────────────────────────────
#> • 9/10 - 3/10
#> • Estimate: 0.6
#> • 95% Confidence Interval:
#>   (0.17, 0.8406)

# Stratified 
strat_df <- dplyr::tibble(
  responses = expand(c(9, 3, 7, 2), c(10, 10, 10, 10)),
  arm = rep(c("treat", "control"), 20),
  strata = rep(c("stratum1", "stratum2"), times = c(20, 20))
)

ci_prop_diff_mn_strata(x = responses, by = arm, strata = strata, data = strat_df)
#> 
#> ── Stratified Score Miettinen-Nurminen Confidence Interval ─────────────────────
#> • 12/20 - 9/20
#> • Weights: stratum1 = 5, stratum2 = 5
#> • Estimate: 0.15
#> • 95% Confidence Interval:
#>   (-0.1606, 0.4338)
```

# Package index

## Confidence Intervals

### Univariate

- [`ci_prop_agresti_coull()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_prop_agresti_coull.md)
  : Agresti-Coull CI
- [`ci_prop_clopper_pearson()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_prop_clopper_pearson.md)
  : Clopper-Pearson CI
- [`ci_prop_jeffreys()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_prop_jeffreys.md)
  : Jeffreys CI
- [`ci_prop_mid_p()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_prop_mid_p.md)
  : Mid-P CI
- [`ci_prop_wald()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_prop_wald.md)
  : Wald CI
- [`ci_prop_wilson()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_prop_wilson.md)
  : Wilson CI
- [`ci_prop_wilson_strata()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_prop_wilson_strata.md)
  : Stratified Wilson CI

### Bivariate

- [`ci_prop_diff_wald()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_prop_diff_wald.md)
  : Wald Confidence Interval for Difference in Proportions
- [`ci_prop_diff_haldane()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_prop_diff_haldane.md)
  : Haldane Confidence Interval for Difference in Proportions
- [`ci_prop_diff_jp()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_prop_diff_jp.md)
  : Jeffreys-Perks Confidence Interval for Difference in Proportions
- [`ci_prop_diff_mee()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_prop_diff_mee.md)
  : Mee Confidence Interval for Difference in Proportions
- [`ci_prop_diff_mn()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_prop_diff_mn.md)
  : Miettinen-Nurminen Confidence Interval for Difference in Proportions
- [`ci_prop_diff_mn_strata()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_prop_diff_mn_strata.md)
  : Stratified Miettinen-Nurminen Confidence Interval for Difference in
  Proportions
- [`ci_prop_diff_ha()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_prop_diff_ha.md)
  : Anderson-Hauck Confidence Interval for Difference in Proportions
- [`ci_prop_diff_nc()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_prop_diff_nc.md)
  : Newcombe Confidence Interval for Difference in Proportions

### Common Risk

- [`ci_prop_diff_mh_strata()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_prop_diff_mh_strata.md)
  : Mantel-Haenszel Common Risk Difference Confidence Interval
- [`ci_prop_diff_nc_strata()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_prop_diff_nc_strata.md)
  : Stratified Newcombe Common Risk Difference Confidence Interval
- [`ci_rel_risk_cmh_strata()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/ci_rel_risk_cmh_strata.md)
  : Mantel-Haenszel Stratified Relative Risk Confidence Interval

### Utilities

- [`expand()`](https://gsk-biostatistics.github.io/cicalc/reference/expand.md)
  : Expand Count Data into Binary Vectors
